articles.title: Video: Trump's National Guard comments un-American, ex-police officer says - CNN Video
articles.description: Former DC Metropolitan police officer Michael Fanone, who was attacked by rioters on January 6, and Anderson Cooper discuss the difference between former President Donald Trump's comments about law enforcement and how he acted on January 6.

articles.author: Sarah Boxer, Andi Babineau and Rob Frehse, CNN
articles.title: Indiana attorney general is investigating the doctor who provided abortion services for a 10-year-old Ohio rape victim, doctor's lawyer says
articles.description: The Indiana doctor who provided abortion services for a 10-year-old girl who was raped is now being investigated by the state's attorney general, according to a lawyer for the doctor.

articles.title: Analysis: Trump shows his 2024 campaign would take the country down a dark and dangerous road
